text: Endre Otto Brunstad (born June 1, 1967) is a Norwegian linguist and professor of Nordic studies education at the University of Bergen's Institute of Linguistics, Literature, and Aesthetic Studies.Cristin Research Information System: Endre Brunstad Terkourafi, Marina, ed. 2010. The Languages of Global Hip Hop. London: Continuum, p. ix. Brunstad is from SykkylvenEndre Brunstad innstilt som ny leiar i Noregs Mållag. Noregs Mållag, 2003. in Møre og Romsdal County. Brunstad was chairman of the Norwegian Language Association () from 2003 to 2005, and he holds a PhD in Nordic linguistics. His research interests include language planning, linguistic purism, and language teaching. ==References== == External links == * *BIBSYS: Publications by Publications by Endre Brunstad Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Linguists from Norway Category:People from Sykkylven Category:University of Bergen faculty
title: Endre Brunstad
